message: I har nginx running on my 10.5.8 Mac OSX machine I just need php to work and it is for development and I dot want to use a package since I will use a remote database

if your using a newer php, then the php fastcgi hooks are in already so you can use nginx's normal proxy setup.  The nginx wiki has fastcgi examples that will get you started and this is what i'm using on one of our php setups:
@jyr I saw that, Didn't like it plus I don't need mysql
just remember to make sure your using php-fpm - that's what I was referring to earlier when I said it's built into newer php builds
@bear yea i know i have php5 with FPM
Feel free to use my nginx configuration organization and templates: https://github.com/levifig/nginx_conf :)
